dubai_men_40.name: DIFC Daniel
dubai_men_40.pain_points: Stress belly, low energy, time-poor, losing competitive edge against younger colleagues.
dubai_men_40.desires: Peak physical and mental performance, to look as successful as he is, to dominate in the boardroom.

abu_dhabi_women_50.name: Embassy Wife Elizabeth
abu_dhabi_women_50.pain_points: Hornonal weight gain from menopause, stress eating due to social obligations, feeling invisible and that it's 'too late' to change.
abu_dhabi_women_50.desires: To fit into her elegant gowns again, to feel confident and vibrant at diplomatic events, to restore her energy and feel feminine.

dubai_women_40.name: Busy Mona
dubai_women_40.pain_points: Stubborn post-baby weight, no 'me-time' between school runs and family duties, feels her husband doesn't see her the same way.
dubai_women_40.desires: To get her pre-baby body back, to feel sexy and confident, to reignite the spark in her marriage.

young_athlete_20.name: Aspiring Alex
young_athlete_20.pain_points: Plateauing in performance, confusion about supplements, fear of injury derailing progress, limited budget but high ambition.
young_athlete_20.desires: To go pro or reach elite level, to optimize every aspect of training and nutrition, to be recognized as a serious athlete.
young_athlete_20.psych_hook: Unlocking elite potential and bypassing average results.

injured_exec_45.name: Post-Injury Peter
injured_exec_45.pain_points: Chronic back pain from sitting, fear of re-injury preventing heavy lifting, feeling fragile despite past strength.
injured_exec_45.desires: To train pain-free, to build functional strength that protects the back, to feel robust and capable again.
injured_exec_45.psych_hook: Rebuilding the foundation and bulletproofing the body.
